42468.name: Female to male ratio of time devoted to unpaid care work (OECD (2014))
42468.description: Female to male ratio of time devoted to unpaid care work. Unpaid care work refers to all unpaid services provided within a household for its members, including care of persons, housework and voluntary community work.

42468.s_name: OECD Gender, Institutions and Development Database (2014)

source.name: OECD Gender, Institutions and Development Database (2014)
source.additionalInfo:
The source does not specify the actual measurement methodology. 

For most countries, estimates correspond to 15-64 year olds. Except: for Australia (15+ year olds), China and Hungary (15-74 year olds) and Sweden (25-64 year olds). 

Estimates refer to different survey years (see source for more details).

Given these differences in measurement, it is important to bear in mind there might be limitations when it comes to cross-country comparisons.
